solution_line_template: The cow provides {total_milk} cups of milk per day and the kids consume {kids_percent_decimal*100}% so they drink {total_milk}*{kids_percent_decimal} = <<{total_milk}*{kids_percent_decimal}={kids_milk}>>{kids_milk} cups of milk
The cow provides {total_milk} cups of milk and the kids drink {kids_milk} cups leaving {total_milk}-{kids_milk} = <<{total_milk}-{kids_milk}={remaining_milk}>>{remaining_milk} cups of milk

Daisy uses {cook_percent_num}% of the remaining {remaining_milk} cups of milk to cook with so she uses {cook_percent_decimal}*{remaining_milk} = <<{cook_percent_num}*{percent_factor}*{remaining_milk}={cook_milk}>>{cook_milk} cups of milk
She had {remaining_milk} cups of milk and used {cook_milk} cups to cook with so that leaves {remaining_milk}-{cook_milk} = <<{remaining_milk}-{cook_milk}={milk_left}>>{milk_left} cups of milk
